p: To identify the muropeptides as well as their chemical structure, samples were run by UPLCâ€“MS (UPLC system interfaced with a Xevo G2/XS Q-TOF mass spectrometer from Waters, Milford, MA, United States) using an organic separation method. Visualization and acquisition of the data was performed by using UNIFI software platform (Waters, Milford, MA, United States).
